DOC.brief_summary: The HDH device intend create sutureless vascular anastomosis various blood vessel . The HDH device consist four part : elastic tube ( graft ) , dock head ( anastomotic device ) , inversion device ( connects vascular graft HDH ) measure device . This study design order evaluate safety efficacy use HDH device method innovative anastomotic device sutureless aortic anastomosis patient diagnose abdominal aneurysm Aorto-iliac aneurysm .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Using HDH Device Method - Novel Sutureless Vascular Anastomosis
